ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
pygments_anyscript adds a plugin for Pygments to with a lexer and a style
for the AnyScript language. AnyScript is the scripting langugage used for
the AnyBody Modeling System; a system for multibody musculoskeletal
analysis.
about.summary: Pygments lexer and style for the AnyScript language

about.description:
pygments_anyscript adds a plugin for Pygments to with a lexer and a style
for the AnyScript language. AnyScript is the scripting langugage used for
the AnyBody Modeling System; a system for multibody musculoskeletal
analysis.
about.summary: Pygments lexer and style for the AnyScript language

name: pygments_anyscript
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.5.0" %}
{% set name = "pygments_anyscript" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6f3d1fb999892c4bbc224b78fa25c4085899ff57e599fd3cf2775a2ee726850a

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - flit-core >=3.4
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pygments

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - pygments_anyscript

about:
  home: http://github.com/AnyBody/pygments-anyscript
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Pygments lexer and style for the AnyScript language'

  description: |
    pygments_anyscript adds a plugin for Pygments to with a lexer and a style 
    for the AnyScript language. AnyScript is the scripting langugage used for 
    the AnyBody Modeling System; a system for multibody musculoskeletal 
    analysis.

  doc_url: https://github.com/AnyBody/pygments-anyscript
  dev_url: https://github.com/AnyBody/pygments-anyscript

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - melund
